Module wgu.softwareiiproject
Package wgu.softwareiiproject

Class Queries

java.lang.Object
wgu.softwareiiproject.Queries
public abstract class Queries extends Object
This is the abstract Queries class. The Queries abstract class holds the methods that queries data to and from the MySQL database.

  • Method Details

    • fillCustomerDataFromDb

      public static void fillCustomerDataFromDb() throws SQLException
      Fills the Customer data with data from the database. This method is called initially when the program is opened to query any existing customer data from the MySQL database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Added to the method signature to handle java.sql.SQLException

    • fillAppointmentDataFromDb

      Throws:
      SQLException - Added to the method signature to handle java.sql.SQLException

    • login

      public static boolean login(String userName, String password) throws SQLException
      Authenticates login information. This method authenticates the login info by querying the user's input to match with what is on the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username that the user inputs in the login form.
      password - The password that the user inputs in the login form.
      Returns:
      true or false depending on if the user has authenticated properly.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Added to the method signature to handle java.sql.SQLException

    • getUserId

      public static int getUserId(String userName) throws SQLException
      Queries the user ID. This helper method takes the Username information and converts it to its accompanying user ID.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username that is to be converted to its user ID.
      Returns:
      the user ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Added to the method signature to handle java.sql.SQLException

    • fillContactList

      public static void fillContactList(javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> contactOptions) throws SQLException
      Queries the contacts from the database. This method queries the contacts from the database to fill the contacts combo-boxes.
      Parameters:
      contactOptions - The observable array list that will be used to set the items for the combo-boxes.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Added to the method signature to handle java.sql.SQLException

    • fillCountryList

    • fillStateList

      public static void fillStateList(javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> stateOptions, String country) throws SQLException
      Queries the states from the database. This method queries the states from the database to fill the states combo-boxes.
      Parameters:
      stateOptions - The observable array list that will be used to set the items for the combo-boxes.
      country - The country that is needed to know which exact states should fill the combo-boxes.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Added to the method signature to handle java.sql.SQLException

    • getCountry

      public static String getCountry(String state) throws SQLException
      Queries a specific country from the database. This helper method queries the country from the state parameter.
      Parameters:
      state - The state that is needed to know which country should be queried.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Added to the method signature to handle java.sql.SQLException
